Plot of abundance (original & log transformed):
```{r}
hist(data$cells_per_litre)
hist(log(data$cells_per_litre))
```

Plots of each species:

```{r}
WorldData <- map_data("world") 
map_colors <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(9,"Pastel1")
```

All coccolithophores:

**may need to fullscreen this plot to see**
```{r}
ggplot(data = data) + coord_equal() + geom_point(aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, color = scientific_name)) + geom_map(data = WorldData, map = WorldData, aes(x = long, y = lat, map_id = region), fill = "white", colour = "#7f7f7f", alpha = 0.5, size=0.5) + theme(legend.position = "right") + ylim(40,90)  + xlim(-50,0)
```
